description: Elevation and shadow tokens for the ComPOSt Design System

xs.description: Extra small shadow for subtle depth.

sm.description: Shadow 100: Default shadow style used for most boxes.

md.description: Shadow 200: Used for hover states of elements with Shadow 100.

lg.description: Shadow 300: Used for elements populated by action.

xl.description: Shadow 400: Strongest shadow used on floating elements.

2xl.description: Maximum shadow for items with significant depth.

layered.description: Complex layered shadow for maximum visibility and depth on all backgrounds.

rules.description: Soul-inspired elevation system focusing on 4 primary shadow levels to guide user focus.
guidelines: Shadow 100 (sm): Default for cards and containers.
Shadow 200 (md): Primary hover state for level 1 containers.
Shadow 300 (lg): Elements revealed by action (popovers, select lists).
Shadow 400 (xl): Floating bars and panels without overlays.
Pressed States: Standardize on shadow-inner for active displacement.
